title: Sound On: Lobbying Blitz Against Tax Hikes
itunes:title: Sound On: Lobbying Blitz Against Tax Hikes
description:
Guests: Aric Newhouse, senior vice president of policy and government relations at the National Association of Manufacturers, Kevin Walling, Democratic strategist at HG Creative Media, Jen Kerns, GOP Strategist, and former Spokeswoman for the California Republican Party and Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
